page.title: 05SOUTH WINGFIELD _ RELIGIONS
page.content: Places of worship in our survey area. Church of England "All Saints Church" Zion Methodist Chapel, Baptist Chapel "Assembly of God", Gospel Hall, Two Wesleyan Chapels (now closed) "Jehovah's Witnesses" (who use their homes for meetings). The parish church has a fairly small weekly congregation but is popular for weddings and christenings. The most popular chapel is the Zion Methodist especially among younger people. There were two Wesleyan Chapels, the first is now a house, the second is a warehouse. The second chapel was built during the l926 strike as the first was too small for the congregation. Congregations are falling at most places of worship.
